content.question: Which of the following functions of <math alttext="x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> is guaranteed by the Extreme Value Theorem to have an absolute maximum on the interval <math alttext="open bracket, 0 comma 2 pi, close bracket " display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>[</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>π</mi><mo>]</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> ?

choices.label: <math alttext="y equals, the fraction with numerator 1, and denominator 1 plus sine x, end fraction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math>
